name: Tommy Richman
description: '''Thomas Anatole Richman''' (born March 21, 2000) is an American rapper. He is best known for his 2024 single "[[Million Dollar Baby (Tommy Richman song)|Million Dollar Baby]]", which received major virality from a snippet on [[TikTok]] before peaking at number two on the [[Billboard Hot 100|''Billboard'' Hot 100]]. The single was included in former President [[Barack Obama]]'s Summer 2024 Playlist and yielded similar success worldwide.
